value:
A cute ribbon from Charlotte. It gives
its wearer a polished look that will
attract the eyes of admirers.

A cute ribbon from Charlotte. It raises
its wearer's cuteness to levels sure to
make any potential admirer swoon!

A handcrafted bear mask from Benny.
Occasionally mistaken for a real bear
thanks to its lifelike appearance.

key: MDAID_クマちゃんの被り物・極
MDAID_H_クマちゃんの被り物・極
value:
A handcrafted bear mask from Benny.
He based the design on a friend he
had as a child.

A veil from Nyx that emanates a
peculiar aura. Said to focus spells
and improve their efficacy.

A veil from Nyx that emanates a
peculiar aura. Said to boost focus
and lend its wearer an elegant look.

An ornate tiara from Orochi. Common
across Hoshido, headwear of this style
is said to ward off evil.

An ornate tiara from Orochi. Made
with quality materials said to empower
curses and improve their efficacy.

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.
Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels on any difficulty.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Book V, Chapter 9: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 9: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 9: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 9: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 9: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

A Nohrian border guard who dreams of
rising above the class of her middling birth.
Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

A Nohrian border guard from a farming
village. A gentle giant loved by animals.
Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

A mage who once grew so overwhelmed by her
own power, she cast a forbidden spell, inflicting
unspeakable loss. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

A Hoshidan diviner who was a frequent visitor
at the castle from a young age, quickly growing
familiar with the royal family. Appears in Fire
Emblem Fates.

The combination of her alluring figure and her
songbird voice are said to have entranced royals
everywhere from Valla to Nohr. Appears in Fire
Emblem Fates.

The god of Nifl, the Kingdom of Ice. Her frozen
personality is as cold and distant as her realm.
Konomura (木ノ村) / Creative House Pocket Co., Ltd

Can reduce incoming damage for both
herself and nearby allies, and can stop
multiple foes from counterattacking!

Can trigger her Special on turn one,
reduce damage taken, and perform
follow-ups before foes can counter.

Strong against magic and staff foes.
Blocks foes' guaranteed follow-ups
and effects that block her follow-ups.

Can effectively sow Panic throughout
the enemy ranks—and is granted up
to Atk/Res+10 during combat.

Cancels "effective against flying" and
counters at any range. Also boosts her
effective stats and slows foe Specials.

Can effectively get Atk+11, Spd+15,
and Def/Res+6, and can also prevent
long-range counterattacks.

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of
an ally, deals damage = 15% of unit's Atk and
grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during
combat, and also, if unit initiates combat or
foe initiates combat and uses magic or staff,
reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40%
and boosts unit's next attack by total damage
reduced (by any source, including other skills).
Resets at end of combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

$aGrants Res+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit during
combat, and also, after combat, if unit attacked,
inflicts【Panic】on target and foes within
2 spaces of target.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Res+7 during combat.

If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +11; 4 grants +7; ≤3 grants +3.
Destroyed defensive structures are
not counted.)

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit's HP ≤ 10% and
unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit's HP ≤ 30% and
unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit's HP ≤ 50% and
unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

Grants Spd/Res+4 and the effect "reduces
damage from foe's first attack by 30%" to
allies within 2 spaces during combat. If unit
is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+4
to unit and reduces damage from foe's first
attack by 30% during combat.
